alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 05 at 8:51PM CST until March 05 at 11:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 29 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ILLINOIS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST ILLINOIS MERCER ROCK ISLAND IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS HANCOCK HENDERSON MCDONOUGH WARREN IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL IOWA CEDAR CLINTON JACKSON JOHNSON JONES LINN MUSCATINE SCOTT IN NORTHEAST IOWA DELAWARE DUBUQUE IN SOUTHEAST IOWA DES MOINES HENRY IA LEE LOUISA WASHINGTON IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST MISSOURI CLARK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALEDO, ANAMOSA, BETTENDORF, BURLINGTON, CARTHAGE, CEDAR RAPIDS, CLINTON, CREDIT ISLAND, DAVENPORT, DUBUQUE, IOWA CITY, KAHOKA, KEOKUK, MACOMB, MANCHESTER, MAQUOKETA, MOLINE, MONMOUTH, MOUNT PLEASANT, MUSCATINE, OQUAWKA, ROCK ISLAND, TIPTON, WAPELLO, AND WASHINGTON.
